meanings.definition: The quality or state of being flat or level.
meanings.sent1: The planarity of the table made it easy to place the books on top.
meanings.sent2: The planarity of the paper made it simple to draw straight lines.
meanings.sent3: The planarity of the pancake was so perfect that it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her calm voice had a planarity that smoothed out the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The planarity of the lake's surface reflected the clear blue sky above.

meanings.definition: The property of a graph or network that can be embedded in a plane without any edges crossing.
meanings.sent1: The planarity of the network allowed for efficient data flow.
meanings.sent2: The planarity of the map made it easy to navigate without confusion.
meanings.sent3: The planarity of the spider's web was a marvel of engineering.
meanings.sent4: The planarity of the puzzle pieces fitting together perfectly was satisfying.
meanings.sent5: The planarity of the city's road system prevented traffic congestion.
